translations.chinese: 父老乃帥子弟共殺沛令，開城門迎高祖，欲以為沛令。
translations.english: The elders then led the young men together to kill the magistrate of Pei, opened the city gates to welcome Emperor Gaozu, and wanted to make him magistrate of Pei.

translations.chinese: 高祖曰：「天下方擾，諸侯並起，令置將不善，一敗塗地。
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu said: "The world is in chaos right now, with feudal lords rising up everywhere. If you appoint a commander who is not capable, one defeat will ruin everything.

translations.chinese: 吾非敢自愛，恐能薄，不能完父兄子弟。
translations.english: I'm not trying to protect myself. I'm afraid my abilities are weak and I cannot protect the fathers, brothers, and children.

translations.chinese: 此 大事，願吏擇可者。」
translations.english: This is a major matter. I hope the officials will choose someone suitable."

translations.chinese: 蕭、曹等皆文吏，自愛，恐事不就，後秦種族其家，盡讓高祖。
translations.english: Xiao, Cao, and the others were all civil officials who cherished themselves. They feared that if things didn't succeed, Qin would exterminate their families, so they all yielded to Emperor Gaozu.
